name: COVID - 19 BIOHAZARD
description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kKV3-JGTvI0
Video game categorized by gamers as one of the most difficult of 2020New updates on December 1 with 2 new scenarios and on January 1, 2021 a futuristic scenario.
We thank the people who purchased our video game. updates are free

STORY:


COVID-19 BIOHAZARD Its a fictionary videogame created to get even with the virus, here you will be able to kill them with powerfull weapons,.You will have a joyfull time!

MISSION


Your mission will be to find the vaccines before the time ends, every time you pick up a vaccine you will have 15 extra seconds on the clock and it will heal 20% of your health. If you get all the vaccines and go through the Exit door you will win and unlock the next level.

GAMEMODE


You can use 3 different weapons, each one with an integrated flashlight, and some grenades you can use to blow up the viruses, but I warn you, it won’t be easy, there are some Mini Bosses that will give you a hard time.
The game contains:
- Character selection
- Level unlock
- First and Third person gameplay
- 3 weapons (simple gun, rifle and shotgun)
- Grenades
- Flashlight
- Enemy Coronavirus
- Mini Bosses

NOW THE GAME CONTAINS 9 LEVELS:


* Factory Part I
*City
*Hospital
*Metro
* Factory Part II
* Post-Apocaliptic City
*Urban-Industrial Zone
* Prision
* Maze


And we are working in another 3 levels more.

FUTURES UPDATES


The virus will update side by side with the virus state, we are planning on add lots of levels, enemies and game elements. This updates will be influenced by the feedback we get in our Discord server (check the English channel). When the cure for the virus is found we will start the final update.
